taxonomicnotes: This is most likely a species complex.
rationale: A. botia has been assessed as Least Concern because, although there are reports of a large decline in suitable habitat in Pakistan, it is not thought that the resulting population decline would qualify for a Threatened or Near Threatened Category on a global scale.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
